text: Narɨ tamɨŋga ñumi ŋɨnɨŋ kru muŋɨnɨŋ kɨndɨ isɨhuramɨndaŋ vata andɨndara, narɨ pɨmɨ aru kavɨrɨmandɨra. Narɨ ambandara, Kru mumɨŋga Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ haŋandɨhinɨndu ñɨmbi yɨhɨta kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ kuma yawi vata nuŋandɨ kuyu tɨkatɨkatɨramandɨ. Kandɨhaŋandɨhinɨrɨm kuyu saŋɨnzaŋ, vamba ambandara. Hara kru mumɨŋga gol Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨyɨ kɨndi haŋandɨhinɨndu ñɨmbi yɨhɨta nuŋandɨ kuyu ha tɨkatɨkatɨramandɨ. Kamata ambɨrɨmandɨ maña andɨmɨ, vamba ambandara.
